description:
Battle your way to glory in this epic RPG!  4.5 stars on iTunes!

DESCRIPTION:
How will your hero's story be told?  Explore new lands, hunt fierce monsters, and challenge other players as you battle for glory!  Buy land, produce resources, build your kingdom and battle your way to glory!

GAME REVIEWS:
• “Best game ever! Should be #1 game on iTunes!” – Nerber066
• “So many games aspire to be as great as this…the game is nothing short of amazing” – Onigami
• “Best RPG role playing game ever” – Dpsaltz
• “This is like a war version of Farmville.” - COLDangel
• “It's an amazing game and has inexpressible depth.” - Rimaka1
• “Surprisingly compelling...rather addictive experience...role playing game crossed with a city building sim...Take up the role of [a hero] in a fantasy setting as you explore lands, hunt monsters, and build up your rep in this new free-to-play social MMO.” - Gamezebo.com

MORE DETAILS:
• Being played LIVE – right now in over 95 countries!
• Sovereign: Kingdoms from JIRBO Games is the first ever massively multiplayer mobile role playing game in the vein of EVE Online.
• Players compete across multiple leaderboards, including Glory, Level, Kills, Plots and more!  As the game continues to grow, expect upcoming features to include a dynamic quest system, guilds – battling for control of territories, and live player-to-player markets.
• Destiny is a powerful tool, which can be used to instantly improve your character's skills, perform powerful combat moves, and progress faster through the game.  Use it to purchase limited edition gear, decorative items and battle your way to glory!

FEATURES:
• Manage Resources – there's a lot to do on your land – grow food, cut lumber, harvest gems or refine ore into metal!
• Dynamic Combat – part character power, part strategy – use initiative to control the combat, smash your foe so he can’t attack, and triumphantly strike down your enemy!
• Facebook Integration – invite your Facebook friends into Sovereign, or just feed your wall!
• Hunt a bestiary of monsters and villains in an immersive world
• Design and Build up your plots
• Regular game content updates

SOCIAL:
• Like Sovereign Kingdoms on Facebook: facebook.com/sovereigngame
• Follow @sovereigngame on Twitter: twitter.com/sovereigngame
• Tweet about Sovereign Kingdoms: #sovereigngame
• Visit our forums at: forums.tapreef.com
• Visit our site at www.sovereigngame.com

Questions?  Comments?  We’re listening and here to help!  
Email us at support@sovereigngame.com
